Uses of Interface
net.xqhs.flash.core.shard.AgentShard

  • Packages that use AgentShard 
    Package Description
    example.compositePingPong
    The scenario of two agents which ping messages between them (one sends and one replies).
    net.xqhs.flash.core.composite
    The package contains classes related to the implementation ofCompositeAgent.
    net.xqhs.flash.core.control  
    net.xqhs.flash.core.monitoring  
    net.xqhs.flash.core.shard
    The package contains interfaces and abstract classes for core agent features.
    net.xqhs.flash.core.support
    Core classes dealing with support items, such as communication and mobility.
    net.xqhs.flash.gui
    Classes related to automatic GUI generation.
    net.xqhs.flash.local
    Package that offers support for local communication.
    net.xqhs.flash.swingGui  
    net.xqhs.flash.webSocket  

    • Uses of AgentShard in example.compositePingPong

      Classes in example.compositePingPong that implement AgentShard 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      class  MonitoringTestShard
      An AgentShard implementation that monitors all agent events.
      class  PingBackTestComponent
      An AgentShard implementation that initially sends a message to another agent, it this agent is designated as initiator.
      class  PingTestComponent
      An AgentShard implementation that sends messages to other agents.

    • Uses of AgentShard in net.xqhs.flash.core.composite

      Fields in net.xqhs.flash.core.composite with type parameters of type AgentShard 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      protected java.util.ArrayList<AgentShard> CompositeAgent.shardOrder
      A List that holds the order in which shards were added, so as to signal agent events to shards in the correct order (as specified by AgentEvent.AgentSequenceType).
      protected java.util.Map<AgentShardDesignation,​AgentShard> CompositeAgent.shards
      The Map that links shard designations (functionalities) to shard instances.
      Methods in net.xqhs.flash.core.composite that return AgentShard 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      AgentShard CompositeAgent.CompositeAgentShardContainer.getAgentShard​(AgentShardDesignation designation)  
      protected AgentShard CompositeAgent.getShard​(AgentShardDesignation designation)
      Retrieves a shard of the agent, by designation.
      protected AgentShard CompositeAgent.removeShard​(AgentShardDesignation designation)
      Removes an existing shard of the agent.
      Methods in net.xqhs.flash.core.composite with parameters of type AgentShard 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      protected CompositeAgent CompositeAgent.addShard​(AgentShard shard)
      Adds a shard to the agent, which has been configured beforehand.

    • Uses of AgentShard in net.xqhs.flash.core.shard

      Classes in net.xqhs.flash.core.shard that implement AgentShard 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      class  AgentShardCore
      This class serves as base for the implementation of agent shards.
      class  AgentShardGeneral
      The class extends AgentShardCore and offers additional functionality for AgentShard implementations, especially in working together with other (known types of) shards.
      class  IOShard  
      Methods in net.xqhs.flash.core.shard that return AgentShard 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      protected AgentShard AgentShardGeneral.getAgentShard​(AgentShardDesignation designation)
      Relay for ShardContainer.getAgentShard(AgentShardDesignation).
      AgentShard ShardContainer.getAgentShard​(AgentShardDesignation designation)
      Returns the agent shard corresponding to the given designation.
      Methods in net.xqhs.flash.core.shard that return types with arguments of type AgentShard 
      Modifier and Type Method Description

    • Uses of AgentShard in net.xqhs.flash.core.support

      Subinterfaces of AgentShard in net.xqhs.flash.core.support 
      Modifier and Type Interface Description
      interface  MessagingShard
      Interface for any shard offering messaging functionality to an entity.
      Classes in net.xqhs.flash.core.support that implement AgentShard 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      class  AbstractMessagingShard
      Prototype class for shards offering messaging functionality, containing some general implementation-independent methods.
      class  AbstractNameBasedMessagingShard
      A simple extension of AbstractMessagingShard, which leaves to implement only AbstractMessagingShard.sendMessage(String, String, String) as an abstract method, and also the registration of a message receiver to the pylon.

      static class  LocalPylon.SimpleLocalMessaging
      Simple implementation of AbstractMessagingShard, that uses agents' names as their addresses.
